hero.subtitle: Your comfortable home away from home

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Residencia is a modern boarding house located in the heart of the city. We offer 20 comfortable rooms designed to make you feel at home while pursuing your studies or career.
about.description2: Our facilities include high-speed Wi-Fi, a communal kitchen, laundry services, and 24/7 security to ensure your comfort and safety.

wifi.title: Free Wi-Fi
wifi.description: High-speed internet in all rooms and common areas

kitchen.title: Shared Kitchen
kitchen.description: Fully equipped kitchen for your cooking needs

community.title: Community
community.description: Friendly environment to meet new people

movieNight.title: Movie Night
movieNight.description: Join us for a fun movie night in the common area!

cookingWorkshop.title: Cooking Workshop
cookingWorkshop.description: Learn to cook delicious local dishes with our guest chef.

gameTournament.title: Game Tournament
gameTournament.description: Compete with your fellow residents in various board and video games.

location.title: Location
location.description: We are conveniently located at 123 Main Street, close to universities, shopping centers, and public transportation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.social: Follow us on social media for updates and promotions!

lease.question: What are the lease terms?
lease.answer: We offer flexible lease terms ranging minimum from 3 months to 1 year. Short-term stays may be available upon request.

utilities.question: Are utilities included in the rent?
utilities.answer: Yes, all utilities including electricity, water, and high-speed internet are included in the monthly rent.

parking.question: Is parking available?
parking.answer: We have limited on-site parking available for an additional monthly fee. Please inquire about availability when booking.

pets.question: Are pets allowed?
pets.answer: Unfortunately, we do not allow pets in our boarding house to ensure the comfort of all residents.

booking.question: How do I book a room?
booking.answer: You can book a room by clicking the "Book a Room" button on our website, which will show you available rooms. Alternatively, you can contact us directly for assistance.
